metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14501 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read flaw exists in parse_file_info inarchive_read_support_format_iso9660.c in libarchive 3.3.2 when extracting aspecially crafted iso9660 iso file, related toarchive_read_format_iso9660_read_header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14501` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libarchive package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4').
